description:
Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Openstack Release - Ocata

I'm not getting dashboard in chrome
title: The requested URL /horizon was not found on this server.

comments.content:
Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Openstack Release - Ocata

I'm not getting dashboard in chrome
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~prakash-npt

comments.content:
IMO, it seems that the issue is not a Nova bug.

You can access the dashboard with URL "/dashboard".
(For example, "http://10.0.2.15/dashboard")

See more information in the following page.

https://docs.openstack.org/horizon/latest/configuration/settings.html#webroot
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi
